CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper May 11, 1946, pg. 17, reads: "High Steppers - These young ladies, dressed as majorettes, were featured in the fashion show presented recently by the Senior Choir of Brown Chapel AME Church, North Side. Many of the latest styles in milady's dress were on display in the show. The Bradford majorettes are directed by Beverly Bradford, on the of the active young members of the church. Many of the creations were original designs. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: The Bradford Majorettes marching on stage in Brown Chapel AME Church for fashion show
